【考法 1】 n./ vt. 称赞，恭维：an expression of praise, admiration, or congratulation
【例】a man meriting['mɛrɪt]值得 the compliments and homage of his fellows
【近】praise, commend, eulogize, extol, laud
【反】vituperate 责骂
【派】complimentary adj. 称赞的：expressing or containing a compliment
【反】vituperative 责骂的
【考法 2】 n. 敬意，免费赠送的礼物：formal and respectful recognition : honor
【例】How about a delicious dessert then, with our compliment? 给您上点甜点怎么样，算是我们小小的敬意。
【记】 源自comply 顺从别人时的言行
【另】 complement 补足,complete 完成就是补足,这样就完成了
